properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 7:15AM CST until January 16 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Northwestern Dallas County in north central Texas...

* Until 915 AM CST.

* At 709 AM CST, Doppler radar and rain gauges indicated
thunderstorms continued to produce heavy rainfall from Dallas Love
Field along I-35E toward the northwest parts of I-635. Automated
rain gauges along North O'Connor Rd near Highway 114 and along
Northwest Highway already reported between 2 and 3 inches of rain.
Excessive runoff from these thunderstorms will cause urban and
small stream flooding. Some low water crossings may become
impassable.

Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is expected over the area. This
additional rain will cause minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as
well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
